divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife and I were traveling east on M-59, having left from Utica, MI at 10:15 on July 28, 2012. A few miles before I-94 we observed a group of orange lights in the northern sky. The lights were arranged in two rows and were moving very slowly south. After about two minutes they formed into a single row and moved quickly south and out of sight. People in the car in the next lane also slowed down and were looking in the same direction as us.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Utica
There was one other sighting in Utica on or around July 28th 2012
